Privacy Policy

Last updated: November 6, 2025

Data Collection

We do not use cookies, tracking scripts, or any third-party analytics services on this website. We do not collect or store any personal data from visitors.

Server Logs

Our web server automatically logs standard information such as IP addresses, access times, and requested URLs. These logs are used solely for technical maintenance and security purposes. Logs are retained for a limited period and are not shared with third parties.

Contact

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at admin@kikuai.dev.
